item.description:
Enjoy an evening in BOND Saturday, August 22, 2009 at 10:00pm; a premiere destination for cosmopolitan dining, cocktails and entertainment. BOND is shimmering yet hip setting for small plate dining options, distinctive cocktails and eclectic music. Starting at 10:00 p.m. on Saturday night, DJ Mario brings live and eclectic beats to the Financial District. BOND features a mix of dining tables and lounge seating with a casual, upscale atmosphere and hosts the Dom Perignon Lounge, an exclusive balcony with seating for private events, overlooking the main restaurant. Ugh! I;m so in love with this place and you will be too!



BOND
Langham Boston
250 Franklin St. (Oliver St.)
Boston, MA 02110
Free Admission
item.name: BOND Restaurant | Lounge
